entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon.
